title: The rate of premium mentioned in the Regulation No
clause_text: The rate of premium mentioned in the Regulation No.14.1.1.7(i)(b) and 14.1.1.7(ii)(b) can be revised by the Government from time to time.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
